product_name: Kill Brow Auto Hard Brow Pencil #07 GRAY PINK
description: Benefits:This is the renewed version of the CLIO Kill Brow Auto Hard Brow Pencil.This brow pencil is available in seven colors, allowing you to create the perfect brows to match your personal coloring.Features CLIO's special hard formula, which helps create soft brows while ensuring the pencil is not easily broken.The hexagon-shaped pencil allows for drawing various shapes, such as sharp edges and wider styles, to achieve all types of eyebrow shapes.It also comes with a sharpener for easy maintenance whenever the pencil becomes blunt. Colors Available:#01 Natural Brown: Classy brown color#02 Light Brown: Bright and soft light brown color#03 Peanut Brown: Pale brown color#04 Light Gray: Light ash gray color#05 Gray Brown: Classy gray color#06 Taupe Gray: Middle tone taupe grey color#07 Gray Pink: Trendy gray pink color How to use:1. Draw a guideline along the eyebrows in an angled shape.2. Fill in any gaps in the eyebrows.3. Gently brush the eyebrows with the included spoolie. Major IngredientsRhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Black Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Staric Acid, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Triethylhexanoin, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Triethylhexanoine, Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), C10-30 Cholesterol/Lanosterol Esters, Red Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Mica (CI 77019), Stearic Acid, Hydroenated Castor Oil, Mica (Ci 77019), [#07 Charcoal Gray]: Mica (Ci 77019), Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Titianium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Titanium Dioxide, Yellow Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Sorbitian Sesquioleate, Tocopherol, C10-30 Cholesterol/Lano Sterol Esters, Carmine (CI 75470)

original_name: [CLIO] Kill Brow Auto Hard Brow Pencil #07 GRAY PINK

description:
Description

Define and shape your brows effortlessly with the [Dearmay] The Chic Eyebrow Pencil. Featuring a 3mm slim pencil tip for precise application and a creamy texture that glides smoothly, it helps create natural, hair-like strokes. The built-in spoolie brush allows for easy blending and grooming, delivering a soft yet defined look that lasts all day.

How To UseUse the attached spoolie brush to groom your brows and shape them in place.Twist out 2–3mm of the pencil and outline your desired brow shape.Fill in sparse areas by drawing light, hair-like strokes along the direction of hair growth.Finish by blending with the spoolie for a natural and seamless look.

Key IngredientsHydrogenated Palm Kernel Glycerides, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ceresin, Silica, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77491, CI 77492), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Tocopheryl Acetate, BHT

description:
Description

Complete your signiture look with delicate brows that define your natural shape and the deep natural colors that sets you apart from others.

Automatic eyebrow pencil that allows everyone to draw each hair effortlessly


hince's signature brow pencil tip : Draw eyebrows strand by strand with hince's sharp pencil tip to complete delicate brow makeup

Solid formula helps you easily build up colors : Buildable formula helps you to build up color and compelte natural-looking eyebrows.

Equipped with a spoolie brush to easily shape and comb the brows.
 
How To Use
Use the narrow tip of the pencil to fill in your eyebrows strand by strand from front to tail.

Finish by brushing your eyebrows with the built-in spoolie to lightly blend.
 
Key Ingredients
Black Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Candelilla Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Synthetic Beeswax, Synthetic Wax, Yellow Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Talc, Mica (CI 77019), Red Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Dimethicone

description:
Description
A tinted brow gel that shapes and tames your eyebrows.Coats hairs from root to tip as it sets, defines, and holds your brows in place all day long.Offers 3 choices with various effects to help create your desired brow looks.Options available:Balance: A brown formula that helps create natural and soft eyebrows.Strong: A transparent formula with strong fixing power and long-lasting performance.Volume: A black formula that helps volumize your eyebrows.
How To UseApply the gel in short upward strokes in the direction of hair growth.
extra_description: Apply the gel in short upward strokes in the direction of hair growth.

description:
Description


FIXING BROWS SHAPE: The natural fixing gel will set your brows strand by strand in place but will not harden.
INCREASING VOLUME: The buildable formula will increase the volume of your brows with each application, lifting strand by strand and leaving none behind.
PRECISE BRUSH WITH NO LUMPS: Easy to use brush for creating a precise brow shape
NATURAL NOURISHING INGREDIENTS: Beeswax, Sunflower seed wax, Carnauba wax provide nutrition and moisture on skin and brow. 100% free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol, ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban.
DEFINE YOUR NATURAL SHAPE: Complete your signature look with delicate brows that define your natural shape and the deep natural colors that sets you apart from others.

How To Use
Keep the bangs of the eyebrows upright, and fix them by sweeping the tails along the grain. If you press gently with your fingers for 5 seconds, you can increase the fixation power.

product_name: Dante One by one Brow Definer (3 Colors)
description:
Description


- This eyebrow pencil comes in soft, natural-looking colors to not be overbearing or artificial looking when used.
- This product has a 1mm thickness that allows for the user to draw various styles of eyebrows from thin to thick.
- This eyebrow pencil was inspired by specific animals, symbolizing the temptations and greed of each of the animals.
- This product is created with a vegan formula and has been officially certified vegan in Korea.

Shades: - 421 Leone : a corduroy beige inspired by lions, which symbolize pride
- 422 Pantera : a combination of caramel ash and sandy ash inspired by panthers, which symbolize greed
- 423 Lupo : a maroon gray inspired by wolves, which symbolize lust
How To Use
1. Draw the desired shape with the wide side of the brow.
2. Fill in the eyebrows with two points according to the desired shape.
3. Gently blend with a soft brush to shape the eyebrows.
Key Ingredients
421 Leone : Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Iron Oxides(CI 77492), Ceresin, Mica, Microcrystalline Wax, Iron Oxides(CI 77499), Iron Oxides(CI 77491), Phenoxyethanol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil 
422 Pantera : Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Iron Oxides(CI 77492), Iron Oxides(CI 77499), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ceresin, Microcrystalline Wax, Mica, Iron Oxides(CI 77491), Phenoxyethanol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil 
423 Lupo : Mica, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ceresin, Iron Oxides(CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Microcrystalline Wax, Iron Oxides(CI 77492), Iron Oxides(CI 77491), Phenoxyethanol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil

product_name: Kill Brow Color Brow Lacouer (3 Colors)
description:
Description

- A brow lacquer that blends naturally with your hair color to create a neat impression- Smaller mini triangular brush allows easy application without worrying about clumping, even if you apply multiple coats- Long-lasting formula keeps the first color for a long time without worrying about smearing
<5 colors>
#01. Natural Brown: suitable for natural hair, calm brown hair color
#02. Light brown: suitable for light brown hair color
#03. Peanut Brown: A pale brown suitable for light-dyed hair color
#04. Reddish Brown: Suitable for red and orange hair colors
#05. Gray Brown: suitable for dark hair color

Suggested Use


Apply with a brush along the eyebrow growth to create a desired shape.

reviews.title: It’s okay
reviews.content: The shade was actually a little darker than expected so it’s good to use a light hand! Holds my eyebrow hairs well.

reviews.title: disappointing
reviews.content: I really liked the idea of a brow lacquer that was also tinted. I chose color #5 which was "grey brown" but it was more like a light to medium brown in color and not dark enough to match my hair. I found the applicator to be a bit too big to apply the actual product to my thin eyebrow hairs. This product should have been advertised as JUST a brow tint or browcara because it does NOT laminate or do any kind of lacquering to hold your brow hairs in place. Disappointed with this item but I do like Clio as a brand and a lot of their other products are great like their cushions. I would skip this product and look for something else.

description:
Description

A triple attack for gorgeous eyebrows! 1.5mm pencil, a pre-loaded powder brush tip, and a spoolie-brush in one tool! 
The pencil allows you to design detailed strokes with the 1.5mm tip and shade your brows without flattening the texture. The  powder brush tip can help minimizing the product fallout.
The pencil formula resists sweat and smudging and stays on your eyebrows throughout the day.
Available in six shades for every skin tone and hair color:
-Classic Gray: Charcoal grey color  -Grace Taupe: Grey brow color  -Modern Beige: Ash beige color -Gentle Brown: Dark brown color -Mild Woody: Milk brown color 

Suggested Use

01. Use the built-in spoolie-brush to brush out the eyebrows. 
02. Use  pencil to shape and define the eyebrow. 
03. Fill the sparse areas with the sponge-tip pre-loaded with powder. 
04. Blend and style the eyebrows with the built-in spoolie-brush for a polished finish.

description:
Description
A brow pencil with a precise stroke to achieve the most natural looking eyebrows.
Its vitamin E delivers moisturization and smooth application to create your desired eyebrow shape. 


Suggest Use
 
1. Use the angle of the tip, fill in the brows with hair like strokes to create the bros shape you want.
2. Using the brush end, brush out for a natural look.
3. Thickly: Apply the wide side of the tip from the front of the eyebrows until the end of the wide part and gently draw the peak point.
4. Thinly: Use the thin side of the pencil tip to draw your eyebrows from the peak point to the tail.

Active Ingredients
Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Zinc Stearate, Stearic Acid, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hexylene Glycol, Mica, Iron Oxides, Iron Oxides, Iron Oxides
